<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".link-btn").on("click", function (evt) {
            evt.preventDefault();
            var url = $(this).data("href");
            if (url == "") return;
            var win = window.open(url, '_blank');
            win.focus();
        })
        //滚动条处理
        var previousScrollTop = 0;
        $(window).on('scroll', onscroll);
        $(window).on('resize', function (evt) {
            var width = 0.16 * $('.content').width();
            $('.left_content').css({
                'width': width,
            })
        });
        function onscroll(evt) {
            var scrollTop = $(this).scrollTop();
            var scrollHeight = $(document).height();
            var windowHeight = $(this).height();
            var top = $(window).scrollTop();

            if (Math.abs(top - previousScrollTop) < 20) return; // ie
            var width = 0.16 * $('.content').width();
            var leftHeigth = $('.left-content').height();
            var headerHeight = $('.page-header').height() + 3;
            var ftHeigth = $('footer').height();
            //左侧导航
            if ((scrollTop + leftHeigth + headerHeight + $("footer").height()) >= (scrollHeight)) {
                // footer show up
                $('.left-content').css({
                    'position': 'absolute',
                    'bottom': 0,
                    'top': 'auto',
                })
            }
            else if($(window).scrollTop() > 50){
                    $('.left-content').css({
                   'position': 'fixed',
                    'top': '8px',
                    'bottom': 'auto',
                    'width': width,
                    })
            }
           else if($(window).scrollTop() == 0){
           $('.left-content').css({
                   'position': 'fixed',
                    'top': '108px',
                    'bottom': 'auto',
                    'width': width,
                    })
           
           }
            previousScrollTop = top;


            //右侧滚动导航
            var title_top = $(" .right-content .secadv-title").offset().top;
            var unique_top = $(".right-content .secadv-unique").offset().top;
            var schema_top = $(".right-content .secadv-schema").offset().top;
            var case_top = $(".right-content .secadv-secase").offset().top;
            var apply_top = $(".right-content .secadv-apply").offset().top;
            var help_top = $(".right-content .secadv-help").offset().top;
            if (scrollTop >= help_top - $(".all-right").height()) {
                $('.right-content .all-right').removeClass("fixed-style").addClass("absolute-style");
                $(".right-content .all-right a").removeClass("selected");
                $(".right-content a[data-value='secadv-help']").addClass("selected");
            }
            else if (scrollTop >= apply_top - $(".all-right").height()) {
                selectli("secadv-apply");
            }
            else if (scrollTop >= case_top - $(".all-right").height()) {
                selectli("secadv-secase");
            }
            else if (scrollTop >= unique_top - $(".all-right").height()) {
                selectli("secadv-unique");
            }
            else if (scrollTop >= schema_top - $(".all-right").height()) {
                selectli("secadv-schema");
            }
            else if (scrollTop >= title_top - $(".all-right").height())
            {
                selectli("secadv-title");
            }
            else {
                $('.all-right').removeClass("fixed-style").removeClass("absolute-style");
            }
        }
        function selectli(sel) {
            $('.right-content .all-right').removeClass("absolute-style").addClass("fixed-style");
            $(".right-content .all-right a").removeClass("selected");
            $(".right-content a[data-value='" + sel + "']").addClass("selected");
        }
        $(document).on("click", ".right-content .all-right a", allRightClick);
        function allRightClick(e) {
            var el = $(this).attr('data-value');
            if (el == "secadv-ques" || el == "secadv-learn")
                el = "secadv-help";
            if (el == "secadv-index" || el == "secadv-guide")
                el = "secadv-apply";
                if (el == "secadv-title")
                scrdistop = 250;
                else
            scrdistop = $(".secshow ." + el).offset().top - $("header").height() - 10;
            $('html, body').animate({
                scrollTop: scrdistop
            }, 300);
            $(".right-content .all-right a").removeClass("selected");
            $(".right-content a[data-value='" + el + "']").addClass("selected");
        }
    });
</script>

                                        <div style="font-size:13px;color:#404040; clear:both;margin-bottom:20px;">架构图涉及 Azure 服务的详细描述：</div>
                                        <h2 class="ad-title"><a id="onlinemarketing-balance" class="anchor"></a>负载均衡</h2>
                                        <p class="ad-content">
                                            功能概述：为后端服务器进行流量分发，避免单点故障，将请求按照四层或七层转发给后端服务器（如企业线上站点集群）处理，支持调度算法并通过热备切换结合分布式确保高可用。
                                        </p>
                                        <div class="ad-distance">
                                            <p>
                                                <span class="span-style">Azure 的构建方案：</span>使用终结点<a id="online_ad_bal" href="/home/features/virtual-machines/" class="ad-btn" style="color:#404040;" target="_blank">负载均衡</a>和/或<a id="online_ad_tra" href="/home/features/traffic-manager/" class="ad-btn" style="color:#404040;" target="_blank">流量管理器</a>构建。
                                            </p>
                                        </div>
                                        <h2 class="ad-title" style="clear:both;margin-top:30px;"><a id="onlinemarketing-enterpriseSite" class="anchor"></a>企业线上站点</h2>
                                        <p class="ad-content">功能概述：承载企业数字营销的对外网站，具备自动缩放能力，可以横向或纵向伸缩，应对高并发负载。</p>
                                        <div class="ad-distance">
                                            <p>
                                                <span class="span-style">Azure 的构建方案：</span>使用 Web Apps <a id="online_ad_col" href="/home/features/web-site/" class="ad-btn" style="color:#404040;" target="_blank">Web 应用</a>或 Cloud Service <a id="online_ad_avm" href="/home/features/cloud-services/" class="ad-btn" style="color:#404040;" target="_blank">云服务</a>构建，站点的静态资源通过 Azure <a id="online_ad_avm" href="/home/features/cdn/" class="ad-btn" style="color:#404040;" target="_blank">CDN</a>进行分发。
                                            </p>
                                        </div>
                                        <h2 class="ad-title" style="clear:both;margin-top:30px;"><a id="onlinemarketing-appBack" class="anchor"></a>企业营销 APP 后端服务器</h2>
                                        <p class="ad-content">

                                            <p>

                                            </p>
                                        </div>

                                <div class="advantage-left">
                                    <div class="section-title">1.国内外数据中心、优质网络带宽和三线 BGP，快速响应客户访问，并降低与线上线下第三方平台的数据延迟</div>

                                    <p>按需横向和纵向扩展以轻松应对营销活动中突发的高并发Web请求和持续的重负载，确保服务连续性，提升目标客户体验。</p>

                                    <div class="section-title">9.高 SLA 承诺，全面满足客户对营销平台服务可靠性的严苛需求</div>
                                    <p>高 SLA 承诺帮助营销平台更具信心地满足客户对服务可靠性的需求，提升客户的满意度。</p>
